text: Emil MiltonAncestry: Emil Milton Cadkin in the U.S. WWII Draft Cards Young Men, 1940-1947 Cadkin (Russian: Эмиль Кадкин; August 26, 1920 - December 16, 2020) was an American composer. He was born in Cleveland, Ohio. He was known for composing the movie scores of The Big Fix (1947) and The Killer Shrews (1959). Cadkin died on December 16, 2020 in Los Angeles at the age of 100.Emil Milton Cadkin ==References== Category:1920 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American composers Category:Writers from Cleveland Category:American centenarians
title: Emil Cadkin
